full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DPYOD LDAN DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I MING CAN NAS PHYOGS 'DIR ME MCHOD KYI SPO LA KUN TU DAR YANG, MCHOD THABS YID BRTAN CHUNG BA ZHIG MI SNANG BAS KHUNGS LDAN 'KHYER BDE'I CHOG ZHIG TZAM GYANG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD THUB PHYIR MAS GONG MA'I MAN NGAG GI PHYAG ? DANG SGO BSTUN TE, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS SU 'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
